name: Ramkumar
text:
Congratulations on one of the most special days of your life. Best of luck for a happy and prosperous marriage to two people who truely deserve each other...

Happy Wedding!

name: Mubarak
text:
As you blend your lives together with each other, I want to wish you a married life full of romance, cuddle and life time of happiness!

Happy Wedding üéâ

name: Praseeda
text: You have played a good role as a brother and I hope you could be a responsible and great person for Nandhini, wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness to start up a wonderful journey together sailing the same feel of love till end, let your love grow day by day and last forever.

name: Swetha
text:
My first friend in DSRC.
When I was longing for a friend here someone to talk with someone to share my problems with I found u üòä an awesome guy.. helpful idiot.
The one who irritates me to the core and who will be there for me no matter what and whatever the situation be..
I know and we all know how much you have been waiting and longing for this day and we were the first happiest person in your friends circle on this great news.
Always stay happie and blessed da Soos..
May god bless u abundantly with all that you wish and desire for. ‚ù§love you loads..
always stay as a good friend by our side.

En paartha üòÉüòÉ

name: Poovika
text:
Looking forward for your life's most beautiful days... My heartiest wishes to you both.. 

Happy married Life

name: Packiaseelan
text: May your wedding day be all that you wish for!! I already know that all your planning will make for a special day filled with lots of wonderful memories. All the very best friend and looking forward to catching up with you both.

name: Vijay
text:
Sudhar machan
It is really a pleasure 2 see u as a perfect couple since the day u both met I have and will always prey to god that yr togetherness last till eternity
Best wishes to ur happy married life machan

name: Balaji
text:
As you blend your lives together with each other, I want to wish you a married life full of romance, cuddle and lifetime of happiness! 

 Happy Wedding

name: Srinivasan
text: Congratulations to you both on your very special day! May your wedding be filled with special memories you can treasure forever.
